chapter.title: Using the Administrative Interface
chapter.para:
Once the ⪚ is set up and initial configuration complete, further administration of the ⪚ generally takes place from the Administrative Interface. The Administrative Interface is launched from a Web Browser. To launch the Administrative Interface, point your browser window at the following address (URL).
http://your_internal_ip
Where your_internal_ip is replaced with the internal IP address of your ⪚. If you do not know the internal IP address of the ⪚, please refer to . After accessing the URL, you should see a page similar to that shown in .
In the center of the screen is a link Launch EdgeGuard Client. Clicking on this link begins the process of launching the Administrative Interface.
